ability: AUTO - [Rest 1 of your characters] When this is placed on stage from hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 Climax from their Waiting Room, and shuffles all other cards from their Waiting Room into their deck.
AUTO - [(1) Discard 1 card] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If you do, this turn, all of your characters get +500 power and +1 Soul.

name: アロナ
ability: COUNTER - Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, this turn, it gets -3 Soul.

name: 対策委員会へようこそ！
ability: 【永】 あなたのキャラすべてに、パワーを＋1000し、ソウルを＋1。
